description:
Behind the Ancient God`s Land, the Eternal Night Demon City in the Demon Cultivation Sea rose up overnight. In order to expand its territory, it constantly attacked the sects around the Demon Cultivation Sea, including the Yuntian Sect where Li Muwan was. Li Muwan was poisoned in the battle to protect the gate, and her life was at stake. After Wang Lin learned about this, he took her into the Demon Cultivation Sea again. Wang Lin fought against the three city lords with his initial cultivation of the God of Incarnation, and became famous in the Demon Cultivation Sea. He brought back the antidote to save Li Muwan, but found that the crisis was not resolved, and the thousand-year conspiracy surfaced. In the end, relying on their feelings and the first fusion with the body of the Ancient God after the God of Incarnation, they joined forces to kill the Demon Lord.
source: bgm.tv/googletranslate

titles.title: 仙逆剧场版 神临之战
Renegade Immortal: Battle of the Divine Descent
Renegade Immortal: Battle of the God
Xian Ni Juchang Ban: Shenlin Zhi Zhan
